GE07bhg4c14u:187: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ [Gītā 13.7] iti sukha-cetanayor apīcchādivat kṣetra-dharmatvena pāṭhāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:188: tatrāntaḥ-karaṇa-dharmasya sukhasya jñānasya cātmany adhyāsaḥ saṅgo 'haṃ jāna iti ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:190: tasmād avidyā-mātram etad iti śataśa uktaṃ prāk ||6||
GE07bhg4c14u:191: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra sattvasya lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatva-prakāraṃ cāha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c14u:194: śāntatvāt svakāryeṇa sukhena yaḥ saṅgaḥ prakāśakatvāt svakāryeṇa jñānena ca yaḥ saṅgaḥ ahaṃ sukhī jñānī cety upādhi-dharmayor avidyayaiva jīvasyābhimānas tena taṃ badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:195: he anagheti tvaṃ tu ahaṃ sukhī ahaṃ jñānīty abhimāna-lakṣaṇam aghaṃ mā svīkur iti bhāvaḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c14u:196: baladevaḥ : atha sattvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ lakṣaṇāni bandhakatva-prakārāṃś cāha tatreti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:197: tatra teṣu triṣu madhye prakāśakaṃ jñāna-vyañjakam anāmayam arogaṃ duḥkha-virodhi-sukha-vyañjakam iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c14u:201: tac ca sattvaṃ sva-kārye jñāne sukhe ca yaḥ saṃyogo jñāny ahaṃ sukhy aham ity abhimānas tena puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:202: jñānaṃ cedaṃ laukika-vastu -yāthātmya-viṣayaṃ sukhaṃ ca dehendriya-prasada-rūpaṃ bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c14u:203: tatra tatra saṅge sati tad-upāyeṣu karmasu pravṛttis tat-phalānubhavopāyeṣu deheṣūtpattiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:204: punaś ca tatra tatra saṅga iti na sattvād vimuktiḥ ||6||
GE07bhg4c14u:209: śrīdharaḥ : rajaso lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatvaṃ cāha raja iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:214: tayos tṛṣṇāsaṅgayoḥ samudbhavo yasmāt tad-rajo dehinaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu saṅgenāsaktyā nitarāṃ badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:215: tṛṣṇāsaṅgābhyāṃ hi karmasu āsaktir bhavatīty arthaḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c14u:217: rajyate viṣayeṣu puruṣo 'neneti rāgaḥ kāmo gardhaḥ sa evātmā svarūpaṃ yasya dharma-dharmitṇos tādātmyāt tad rāgātmakaṃ rajo viddhi |
GE07bhg4c14u:219: prāptasyopasthite 'pi vināśe saṃrakṣaṇābhilāṣa āsaṅgas tayos tṛṣṇāsaṅgayoḥ sambhavo yasmāt tad rajo nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:220_0: he kaunteya ! karma-saṅgena karmasu dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu aham ikdaṃ karomy etat phalaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:220_1: bhokṣya ity abhiniveśa-viśeṣeṇa dehinaṃ vastuto 'kartāram eva kartṛtvābhimāninaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:224: tayoḥ samudbhavo yasmāt tad rajaḥ dehinaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu saṅgenāsaktyā badhnāti tṛṣṇā-saṅgābhyāṃ karmasv āsaktir bhavati ||7||
GE07bhg4c14u:226: raja iti rāgaḥ strī-puruṣayor mitho 'bhilāsas tad-ātmakaṃ rajo-vṛddhi-hetu-kāryayos tādātmyāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:228: putra-mitrādi-saṃyogo 'bhilāṣaḥ saṅgas tayoḥ sambhavo yasmāt tat |
GE07bhg4c14u:230: tad rajaḥ strī-viṣaya-putrādi-prāpakeṣu karmasu saṅgenābhilāṣeṇa dehinaṃ puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:233: punar apy evam iti rajaso na vimuktiḥ ||7||
GE07bhg4c14u:236: tamas tv ajñāna-jaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarva-dehinām |
GE07bhg4c14u:238: śrīdharaḥ : tamaso lakṣaṇaṃ bandhakatvaṃ cāha tama iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:239: tamas tv ajñānāj jātam āvaraṇa-śakti-pradhānāt prakṛty-aṃśād udbhutaṃ viddhīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:241: ataeva pramādenālasyena nidrayā ca tat tamo dehinaṃ nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:246: ajñānād āvaraṇa-śakti-rūpād udbhūtam ajñāna-jaṃ tamo viddhi |
GE07bhg4c14u:247: ataḥ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ mohanam aviveka-rūpatvena bhrānti-janakam |
GE07bhg4c14u:248: pramādenālasyena nidrayā ca tat tamo nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:255: ajñānam ajñānāt svīya-phalāt jātaṃ pratītam anumitaṃ bhavatīty ajñānajam ajñāna-janakam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:263: tasmāj jātaṃ tamo ætaḥ sarva-dehināṃ mohanaṃ viparyaya-jñāna-janakam |
GE07bhg4c14u:264: tathā ca vastu-yāthātmya-jñānāvarakaṃ viparyaya-jñāna-janakaṃ tamaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:265: tat tamaḥ pramādādibhiḥ svakāryaiḥ puruṣaṃ nibadhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:266: tatra pramādo 'navadhānam akārye karmaṇi pravṛtti-rūpaṃ sattva-kārya-prakāśa-virodhī |
GE07bhg4c14u:271: sattvaṃ sukhe saṃjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata |
GE07bhg4c14u:272: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde saṃjayaty uta ||9||
GE07bhg4c14u:273: śrīdharaḥ : sattvādīnām evaṃ sva-sva-kārya-karaṇe sāmarthyātiśayam āha sattvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:275: duḥkha-śokādi-kāraṇe sabhāpi sukhābhimukham eva dehinaṃ karotiīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:276: evaṃ sukhādi-kāraṇe saty api rajaḥ karmaṇy eva sañjayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:277: tamas tu mahat-saṅgena utpādyamānam api jñānam āvṛtyaācchādya pramāde sañjayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:281: viśvanāthaḥ : uktam evārthaṃ saṅkṣepeṇa punar darśayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:282: sattvaṃ kartṛ sukhe svīya-phale āsaktaṃ jīvaṃ sañjayati vaśīkaroti nibadhnātīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:283: rajaḥ kartṛ karmāṇi āsaktaṃ jīvaṃ badhnāti |
GE07bhg4c14u:284: tamaḥ kartṛ pramāde 'bhirataṃ taṃ jñānam āvṛtya ajñānam utpādyety arthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c14u:285: baladevaḥ : guṇāḥ svāny advayotkṛṣṭāḥ santaḥ svakārye tanvantīty āha sattvam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:286: sattvam utkṛṣṭaṃ sat sva-kārye sukhe puruṣaṃ sañjayaty āsaktaṃ karoti |
GE07bhg4c14u:287: rajo utkṛṣṭaṃ sat karmāṇi taṃ sañjayati |
GE07bhg4c14u:288: tama utkṛṣṭaṃ sat pramāde taṃ sañjayati jñānam āvṛtyācchādyājñānam utpādyety arthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c14u:291: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata |
GE07bhg4c14u:292: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:293: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha raja iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:294: rajas-tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūya tiraskṛtya sattvaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:297: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūyodbhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:299: evaṃ tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cobhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:300: tataś ca sva-kārye pramādālasyādau sañjayatīty arthaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:301: madhusūdanaḥ : uktaṃ kāryaṃ kadā kurvanti guṇāḥ ? ity ucyate raja iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:302: rajas tamaś ca yugapad ubhāv api guṇāv abhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati udbhavati vardhate yadā,
GE07bhg4c14u:303: tadā sva-kāryaṃ prāg-uktam asādhāraṇyena karotīti śeṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:304: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūyodbhavati yadā,
GE07bhg4c14u:306: tathā tadvad eva tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cety ubhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati yadā,
GE07bhg4c14u:309: uktaṃ sva-sva-kāryaṃ sukhādikaṃ prati guṇāḥ kathaṃ prabhavantīty apekṣāyām āha rajas tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayam abhibhūya tiraskṛtya sattvaṃ bhavati adṛṣṭa-vaśād udbhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:310: evaṃ rajo 'pi sattvaṃ tamaś ceti guṇa-dvayābhibhūya tādṛśādṛṣṭa-vaśād udbhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:311: tamo 'pi sattvaṃ rajaś cobhāv api guṇāv abhibhūyodbhavati ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:313: sameṣu triṣu katham akasmād ekasyotkarṣa iti cet prācīna-tādṛśa-karmodayāt tādṛśāhārāc ca svabhavatīti bhavavān āha raja iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:314: sattvaṃ kartṛ rajas tamaś cābhibhūyo tiraskṛtyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:315: rajaḥ kartṛ sattvaṃ tamaś cābhibhūyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:316: tamaḥ kartṛ sattvaṃ rajaś cābhibhūyotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:317: yadotkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati, tadā pūrvoktam asādhāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ karotīti śeṣaḥ ||10||
GE07bhg4c14u:321: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta ||11||
GE07bhg4c14u:322: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādīnāṃ vivṛddhānāṃ liṅgāny āha sarva-dvāreṣv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:323: asminn ātmano bhogāyatane dehe sarveṣv api dvāreṣu śrotrādiṣu yadā śabdādi-jñānātmakaḥ prakāśa upajāyate utpadyate tadānena prakāśaliṅgena sattvaṃ vivṛddhaṃ vidyāj jānīyāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:324: uta śabdāt sukhādi-liṅgenāpi jānīyād ity uktam ||11||
GE07bhg4c14u:325: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīm udbhūtānāṃ teṣāṃ liṅgāny āha tribhiḥ sarva-dvāreṣv iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:326: asminn ātmano bhogāyatane dehe sarveṣv api dvāreṣūpalabdhi-sādhaneṣu śrotrādi-karaṇeṣu yadā prakāśo buddhi-pariṇāma-viśeṣo viṣayākāraḥ sva-viṣayāvaraṇa-virodhī dīpavat,
GE07bhg4c14u:327: tad eva jñānaṃ śabdādi-viṣaya upajāyate tadānena śabdādi-viṣaya-jñānākhya-prakāśena liṅgena prakāśātmakaṃ sattvaṃ vivṛddham udbhūtam iti vidyāj jānīyāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:329: viśvanāthaḥ : vardhamāno guṇa eva svāpekṣayā kṣīṇāv itarau guṇāv abhivaatīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c14u:330: atas teṣāṃ vṛddhi-liṅgāny āha sarveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:333: jñānaṃ vaidika-śabdādi-yathārtha-jñānātmakaṃ tadā tādṛśa-jñāna-liṅgenaiva sattvaṃ vivṛddham iti jānīyāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:335: baladevaḥ : utkṛṣṭānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ liṅgāny āha sarveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:336: yadā sarveṣu jñāna-dvāreṣu śrotrādiṣu śabdādi-yāthātmya-prakāśa-rūpṃ jñānam upajāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:337: tadā tādṛśa-jñāna-liṅgenāsmin dehe sattvaṃ vivṛddhaṃ vidyāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:342: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā |
GE07bhg4c14u:345: lobho dhanādy-āgame jāyamāne 'pi punaḥ punar vardhamāno 'bhilāṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:348: aśama idaṃ kṛtvā idaṃ kariṣyāmi ity ādi saṅkalpa-vikalpānuparamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:349: spṛhā uccāvaceṣu dṛṣṭa-mātreṣu vastuṣu itas tato jighṛkṣā |
GE07bhg4c14u:350: rajasi vivṛddhe saty etāni liṅgāni jāyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:351: etais tamaso vivṛddhir jāānīyād ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c14u:353: mahati dhanāgame jāyamāne 'py anukṣaṇaṃ vardhamānas tad-abhilāṣo lobhaḥ sva-viṣaya-prāpsya-nivartya icchā-viśeṣa iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c14u:357: spṛhoccāvaceṣu para-dhaneṣu dṛṣṭa-mātreṣu yena kenāpy upāyenopāditsā |
GE07bhg4c14u:358: rajasi rāgātmake vivṛddha etāni rāgātmakāni liṅgāni jāyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:359: he bharatarṣabha ! etair liṅgair vivṛddhaṃ rajo jānīyād ity arthaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c14u:360: viśvanāthaḥ : pravṛttir nānā prayatna-paratā karmaṇām ārambho gṛhādi-nirmāṇodyamaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:370: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:377: tamasi vivṛddhe saty etāni liṅgāni jāyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:378: etais tamaso vivṛddhiṃ jānīyād ity arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c14u:379: madhusūdanaḥ : aprakāśaḥ saty apy upadeśādau bodha-kāraṇe sarvathā bodhāyogyatvam |
GE07bhg4c14u:380: apravṛttiś ca saty apy agnihotraṃ juhuyād ity ādau pravṛtti-kāraṇaṃ janita-bodhe 'pi śāstre sarvathā tat-pravṛtty-ayogyatvam |
GE07bhg4c14u:382: moha eva ca moho nidrā viparyayo vā |
GE07bhg4c14u:385: tamasy eva vivṛddha etāni liṅgāni jāyante he kuru-nandana ! ata etair liṅgair avayabhicāribhir vivṛddhaṃ tamo jānīyād ity arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c14u:393: pramādaḥ karādisthe 'py arthe nāstīti pratyayo moho mithyābhiniveśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:397: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti deha-bhṛt |
GE07bhg4c14u:399: śrīdharaḥ : maraṇa-samaya eva vivṛddhānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ phala-viśeṣam āha yadeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:400_0: sattva pravṛddhe sati yadā jīvo mṛtyuṃ prāpnoti tadā uttamān hiraṇyagarbhādīn vidanti
GE07bhg4c14u:400_1: upāsata ity uttama-vidaḥ teṣāṃ ye amalāḥ prakāśamayā lokāḥ sukhopabhoga-sthāna-viśeṣās
GE07bhg4c14u:401: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ maraṇa-samaye vivṛddhānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ phala-viśeṣam āha yadeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:402: sattve pravṛddhe sati yadā pralayaṃ mṛtyuṃ yāti prāpnoti deha-bhṛd dehābhimānī jīvaḥ,
GE07bhg4c14u:403: tadottamā ye hiraṇyagarbhādayas tad-vidāṃ tad-upāsakānāṃ lokān deva-sukhopabhoga-sthāna-viśeṣān amalān rajas-tamo-mala-rahitān pratipadyate prāpnoti ||14||
GE07bhg4c14u:405: tadā uttamaṃ vindanti labhanta ity uttama-vido hiraṇya-garbhādy-upāsakās teṣāṃ lokān amalān sukha-pradān ||14||
GE07bhg4c14u:406: baladevaḥ : mṛti-kāle vivṛddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ phala-viśeṣān āha yad eti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:407: sattve pravṛddhe sati yadā deha-bhṛj jīvaḥ pralayaṃ yāti mriyate,
GE07bhg4c14u:408: tadottama-vidāṃ hiraṇya-garbhādy-upāsakānāṃ lokān divya-bhogopetān pratipadyate labhate |
GE07bhg4c14u:415: rajasi pravṛddhe sati mṛtyuṃ prāpya karmāsakteṣu manuṣyeṣu jāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:416: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe sati pralīno mṛto mūḍha-yoniṣu jāyate ||15||
GE07bhg4c14u:418: rajasi pravṛddhe sati pralayaṃ mṛtyuṃ gatvā prāpya karma-saṅgiṣu śruti-smṛti-vihita-pratiṣiddha-karma-phalādhikāriṣu manuṣyeṣu jāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:419: tathā tadvad eva tamasi pravṛddhe pralīno mṛto mūḍha-yoniṣu paśv-ādiṣu jāyate ||15||
GE07bhg4c14u:422: rajasi pravṛddhe pralayṃ maraṇaṃ gatvā janaḥ karma-saṅgiṣu kāmya-karmāsakteṣu nṛṣu madhye jāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:423: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe pralīno mṛto jano mūḍha-yoniṣu paśv-ādiṣu ||15||
GE07bhg4c14u:427: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam ||16||
GE07bhg4c14u:428: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādīnāṃ svānurūpa karma-dvāreṇa vicitra-phala-hetutvam āha karmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:429: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ sāttvikaṃ sattva-pradhānaṃ nirmalaṃ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalam āhuḥ kapilādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:430: rajasa iti rājasasya karmaṇa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:433: tamasa iti tāmasasya karmaṇa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:435: sāttvikādi-karma-lakṣaṇaṃ ca niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādinā aṣṭādaśe 'dhyāye vakṣyati ||16||
GE07bhg4c14u:436: madhusūdanaḥ : idānīṃ svānurūpa-karma-dvārā sattvādīnāṃ vicitra-phalatāṃ saṃkṣipyāha karmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:437: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇo dharmasya sāttvikaṃ sattvena nirvṛttaṃ nirmalaṃ rajas-tamo-malāmiśritaṃ sukhaṃ phalam āhuḥ paramarṣayau |
GE07bhg4c14u:438: rajaso rājasasya tu karmaṇaḥ pāpa-miśrasya puṇyasya phalaṃ rājasaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkha-bahulam alpaṃ sukhaṃ kāraṇānurūpyāt kāryasya |
GE07bhg4c14u:439: ajñānam aviveka-prāyaṃ duḥkhaṃ tāmasaṃ tamasas tāmasasya karmaṇo 'dharmasya phalam |
GE07bhg4c14u:441: sāttvikādi-karma-lakṣaṇaṃ ca niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādināṣṭādaśe vakṣyati |
GE07bhg4c14u:442: atra rajas-tamaḥ-śabdau tat-kārye prayuktau kārya-kāraṇayor abhedopacārāt gobhiḥ śrīṇīta matsaram ity atra yathā go-śabdas tat-prabhave payasi,
GE07bhg4c14u:443: yathā vā dhānyam asi dhinuhi devān ity atra dhānya-śabdas
GE07bhg4c14u:444: tat-prabhave taṇḍule | tatra payas taṇḍulayor ivātrāpi karmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt ||16||
GE07bhg4c14u:445: viśvanāthaḥ : sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ sāttvikam eva nirmalaṃ nirupadravam |
GE07bhg4c14u:447: baladevaḥ : atha guṇānāṃ svānurūpakarmadvārā vicitra-phala-hjetutvam āha karmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:448: sukṛtasya sāttvikasya karmaṇo nirmalaṃ phalam āhur guṇa-svabhāva-vido munayo mala-duḥkha-moha-rūpa-rajas-tamaḥ-phala-lakṣaṇān nirgataṃ sukham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:450: rajaso rājasasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ duḥkhaṃ kāryasya kāraṇānurūpyād duḥkha-pracuraṃ kiñcit sukham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:451: tamas tāmasasya karmaṇo hiṃsādeḥ phalam ajñāna-caitanya-prāyaṃ duḥkham evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:452: tatra rajas-tamah-śabdābhyāṃ rājasa-tāmasa-karmaṇī lakṣye gobhiḥ prīṇita-matsaram ity atra yathā go-śabdena go-payo lakṣyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:453: sāttvikādi-karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇāny aṣṭādaśe vakṣyante niyataṃ saṅga-rahitam ity ādibhiḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c14u:456: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:458: śrīdharaḥ : tatraiva hetum āha sattvād iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:460: ataḥ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:462: tasya ca duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo duḥkhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:464: tatas tāmasasya karmaṇo 'jñāna-prāpakaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti yuktam evety arthaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c14u:465: madhusūdanaḥ : etādṛśa-phala-vaicitrye pūrvoktam eva hetum āha sattvād iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:467: atas tad-anurūpaṃ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-bahulaṃ sukhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:468: rajaso lobho viṣaya-koṭi-prāptyāpi nivartayitum aśakyo 'bhilāṣa-viśeṣo jāyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:469: tasya ca nirantaram upacīyamānasya pūrayitum aśakyasya sarvadā duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya rājasasya karmaṇo duḥkhaṃ phalaṃ bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:470: evaṃ pramāda-mohau tamasaḥ sakāśād bhavato jāyete |
GE07bhg4c14u:473: atas tāmasasya karmaṇas tāmasam ajñānādi-prāyam eva phalaṃ bhavatīti yuktam evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:475: pramādo mohaś cāprakāśo 'pravṛttiś cety atra vyākhyātau ||17||
GE07bhg4c14u:477: baladevaḥ : īdṛk-phala-vaicitrye prāg uktam eva hetum āha sattvād iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:479: ataḥ sāttvikasya karmaṇaḥ prakāśa-pracuraṃ sukhaṃ phalam |
GE07bhg4c14u:480: rajaso lobhas tṛṣṇā-viśeṣo yo viṣayakoṭibhir apy abhisevitair duṣpūras tasya ca duḥkha-hetutvāt tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo duḥkha-pracuraṃ kiñcit sukhaṃ phalam |
GE07bhg4c14u:481: tamasas tu pramādādīni bhavanty atas tat-pūrvakasya karmaṇo 'caitanya-pracuraṃ duḥkham eva phalam ||17||
GE07bhg4c14u:484: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:486: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ sattvādi-vṛtti-śīlānāṃ phala-bhedam āha ūrdhvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:488: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvotkarṣa-tāratamyād uttarottaraṇataguṇānandān manuṣya-gandharva-pitṛdevādi-lokān satya-loka-paryantān prāpnuvantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:496: idānīṃ sattvādi-vṛtta-sthānāṃ prāg-uktam eva phalam ūrdhva-madhyādho-bhāvenāha ūrdhvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:497: atra tṛtīye guṇe vṛtta-śabda-yogād ādyayor api vṛttam eva vivakṣitam |
GE07bhg4c14u:498: tena sattvasthāḥ sattva-vṛtte śāstrīye jñāne karmaṇi ca niratā ūrdhvaṃ satya-loka-paryantaṃ deva-lokaṃ gacchanti te deveṣūtpadyante jñāna-karma-tāratamyena |
GE07bhg4c14u:499: tathā madhye manuṣya-loke puṇya-pāpa-miśre tiṣṭhanti na tūrdhvaṃ gacchanty adho vā manuṣyeṣūtpadyante rājasā rajo-guṇa-vṛtte lobhādi-pūrvake rājase karmaṇi niratāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:500: jaghanya-guṇa-vṛttasthā jaghanyasya guṇa-dvayāpekṣayā paścād-bhāvino nikṛṣṭasya tamaso guṇasya vṛtte nidrālasyādau sthitā adho gacchanti paścādiṣūtpadyante |
GE07bhg4c14u:501: kadācij jaghanya-guṇa-vṛtta-sthāḥ sāttvikā rājasāś ca bhavanty ata āha tāmasāḥ sarvadā
GE07bhg4c14u:502: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ | itareṣāṃ kadācit tad-vṛtta-sthatve 'pi na tat-pradhānateti bhāvaḥ ||18||
GE07bhg4c14u:505: jaghanyaś cāsau guṇaś ceti tasya vṛttiḥ pramādālasyādis tatra sthitā adho gacchanti narakaṃ yānti ||18||
GE07bhg4c14u:506: baladevaḥ : atha sattvādi-vṛtti-niṣṭhānāṃ tāny eva phalāny ūrdhva-madhyādho-bhāvenāha ūrdhvam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:507: tamasi vṛtti-śabdād itarayoś ca vṛttir vivakṣitā |
GE07bhg4c14u:509: rājasā rajo-vṛtti-niṣṭhā madhye puṇya-pāpa-miśrite manuṣya-loke tiṣṭhanti |
GE07bhg4c14u:511: jaghanyaḥ sattva-rajo 'pekṣayā nikṛṣṭo yo guṇas tamaḥ-saṃjñas tad-vṛttau pramādādau sthitās tv adho gacchanti tamas-tāratamyena paśu-pakṣi-sthāvarādi-yoniṃ labhante |
GE07bhg4c14u:512: tāmasā ity uktis teṣāṃ sarvadā tamasi sthitiṃ vyanakti ||18||
GE07bhg4c14u:516: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti mad-bhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati ||19||
GE07bhg4c14u:518: tad evaṃ prakṛti-guṇa-saṅga-kṛtaṃ saṃsāra-prapañcam uktvā idānīṃ tad-vivekato mokṣaṃ darśayati nānyam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:519: yadā tu draṣṭā vivekī bhūtvā buddhyādyākāra-pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ nānupaśyati |
GE07bhg4c14u:520: api tu guṇa eva karmāṇi kurvantīti paśyati |
GE07bhg4c14u:521: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vyatiriktaṃ tat-sākṣiṇam ātmānaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c14u:522: sa tu mad-bhāvaṃ brahmatvam adhigacchati prāpnoti ||19||
GE07bhg4c14u:523: madhusūdanaḥ : asminn adhyāye vaktavyatvena prastutam artha-trayam |
GE07bhg4c14u:524: tatra kṣetra-kṣetrajña-saṃyogasyeśvarādhīnatvaṃ ke vā guṇāḥ kathaṃ vā te badhnantīty artha-dvayam uktam |
GE07bhg4c14u:525: adhunā tu guṇebhyaḥ kathaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ muktasya ca kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti vaktavyam avaśiṣyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:526: tatra mithyā-jñānātmakatvād guṇānāṃ samyag-jñānāt tebhyo mokṣaṇam ity āha nānyam iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:527_0: guṇebhyaḥ kārya-kāraṇa-viṣayākāra-pariṇatebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭā vicāra-kuśalaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:527_1: sann anupaśyati vicāram anu na paśyati guṇā evāntaḥ-karaṇa-bahiṣkaraṇa-śarīra-viṣaya-bhāvāpannāḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:528: guṇebhyaś ca tat-tad-avasthā-viśeṣeṇa pariṇatebhyaḥ paraṃ guṇa-tat-kāryāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ tad-bhāsakam ādityam iva jala-tat-kampādy-asaṃspṛṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:529: nirvikāraṃ sarva-sākṣiṇaṃ sarvatra samaṃ kṣetrajñam ekaṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c14u:531: vīśvāṇaṭḥaḥ : guṇa-kṛtaṃ saṃsāraṃ darśayitvā guṇātītaṃ mokṣaṃ darśayati nānyam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:532: guṇebhyaḥ kartṛ-karaṇ-viṣayākāreṇa pariṇatebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ draṣṭā jīvo yadā nānupaśyati,
GE07bhg4c14u:533: kintu guṇā eva sadaiva kartāra ity evam anupaśyati anubhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:534: guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ vyatirikam evātmānaṃ vetti tadā sa draṣṭā mad-bhāvaṃ mayi sāyujyam adhigacchati prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c14u:535: tatra tādṛśa-jñānānantaram api mayi parāṃ bhaktiṃ kṛtvaiva ity upānta-ślokārtha-dṛṣṭyā jñeyam ||19||
GE07bhg4c14u:536: baladevaḥ : evaṃ guṇa-vivekāt saṃsāram uktvā tad-vivekān mokṣam āha nānyam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c14u:537: draṣṭā tattva-yāthātmya-darśī jīvo yadā dehendriyātmanā pariṇatebhyo guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ nānupaśyati guṇān kartĪn paśyaty ātmānaṃ guṇebhyaḥ parama-kartāraṃ vetti |
GE07bhg4c14u:539: ayam āśayaḥ -- na khalu vijñānānando viśuddho jīvo yuddha-yajñādi-duḥkhamaya-karmaṇāṃ kartā,
GE07bhg4c14u:540: kintu guṇamaya-dehendriyavān eva saṃstatheti guṇa-hetukatvād guṇa-niṣṭhaṃ tat-karma-kartṛtvaṃ na tu viśuddhātma-niṣṭham iti yadānupaśyati,
GE07bhg4c14u:543: iha guṇa-hetukaṃ kartṛtvaṃ śuddhasya niṣiddhaṃ, na tu śuddha-niṣṭham iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:547: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī deha-samudbhavān |
GE07bhg4c14u:549: śrīdharaḥ : tataś ca guṇa-kṛta-sarvānartha-nivṛttyā kṛtārtho bhavatīty āha guṇān iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:550: dehādyākāraḥ samudbhavaḥ pariṇāmo yeṣāṃ te deha-samudbhavāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:551: tān etāṃ trīn api guṇān atītyātikramya tat-kṛtair janmādibhir vimuktaḥ sann amṛtam aśnute paramānandaṃ prāpnoti ||20||
GE07bhg4c14u:552: madhusūdanaḥ : katham adhigacchatīty ucyate - guṇān iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:553_0: guṇān etān māyātmakās trīn sattva-rajas-tamo-nāmno deha-samudbhavān dehotpatti-bīja-bhūtān
GE07bhg4c14u:553_1: atītya jīvann eva tattva-jñānena bādhitvā janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhair janmanā mṛtyunā
GE07bhg4c14u:553_2: jarayā duḥkhaiś cādhyātmikādibhir māyā-mayair vimukto jīvann eva tat-sambandha-śūnyaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:553_3: san vidvān amṛtaṃ mokṣam aśnute prāpnoti ||20 ||
GE07bhg4c14u:554: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca so 'pi guṇātīta evocyata ity āha guṇān iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c14u:555: baladevaḥ : mad-bhāva-padenoktam arthaṃ sphuṭayati guṇān iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:556: dehī deha-madhya-stho 'pi jīvo guṇa-puruṣa-viveka-balenaitān deha-samudbhavān dehotpādaāṃs trīn guṇān atītyollaṅghya janmādibhir vimukto 'mṛtam ātmānam aśnute 'nubhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:558: evaṃ vakṣyati brahma-bhūtaḥ prasannātmā ity ādi ||20||
GE07bhg4c14u:561: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho |
GE07bhg4c14u:562: kim-ācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:564: guṇān etān atītyāmṛtam aśnuta ity etat śrutvā guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:565: he prabho kair liṅgaiḥ kīdṛśair ātma-vyutpannaiś cihnair guṇātīto dehī bhavatīti lakṣaṇa-praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:568: kathaṃ ca kenopāyena etāṃs trīn api guṇān atītya vartate |
GE07bhg4c14u:571: guṇān etān atītya jīvann evāmṛtam aśnuta ity etac chrutvā guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam cācāraṃ ca guṇātyayopāyaṃ ca samyag bubhutsur arjuna uvāca kair iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:572: etān guṇān atīto yaḥ sa kair liṅgair viśiṣṭo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:573: yair liṅgaiḥ sa jñātuṃ śakyas tāni me brūhīty ekaḥ praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:574: prabhutvād bhṛtya-duḥkhaṃ bhagavataiva nivāraṇīyam iti sūcayan sambodhayati prabho iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:576: kiṃ yatheṣṭa-ceṣṭaḥ kiṃ vā niyantrita iti dvitīyaḥ praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:577: kathaṃ vā kena ca prakāreṇaitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate 'tikrāmatīti guṇātītatvopāyaḥ ka iti tṛtīyaḥ praśnaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:579: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā dvitīyādhyāye pṛṣṭam apy arthaṃ punas tato 'pi viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchati kair liṅgaiḥ ity ekaḥ praśnaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:580: kaiś cihnais triguṇātītaḥ sa jñeya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:584: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādau sthita-prajño guṇātītaḥ kathaṃ syād iti tadānīṃ na pṛṣṭam idānīṃ tu pṛṣṭam iti viśeṣaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:585: baladevaḥ : guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam ācāraṃ ca guṇātyaya-sādhanaṃ cārjunaḥ pṛcchati kair ity ardhakena |
GE07bhg4c14u:586: prathamaḥ praśnaḥ kaiś cihnair guṇātīto jñātuṃ śakya ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:587: kim ācāra iti dvitīyaḥ sa kiṃ yatheṣṭācāro niyatācāro vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:588: kathaṃ caitān iti tṛtīyaḥ kena sādhanena guṇān atyetīty arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c14u:591: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava |
GE07bhg4c14u:592: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati ||22||
GE07bhg4c14u:594_0: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā dvitīye 'dhyāye pṛṣṭam api dattottaram
GE07bhg4c14u:594_1: api punar viśeṣa-bubhūtsayā pṛcchatīti jñātvā prakārāntareṇa tasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān
GE07bhg4c14u:596: prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'sminn iti pūrvoktaṃ sattva-kāryam |
GE07bhg4c14u:600: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni santi duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c14u:601: nivṛttāni ca santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati, guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti caturthenānvayaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c14u:603_0: sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā [Gītā 2.54] ity ādinā pṛṣṭam api prajahāti yadā kāmān [Gītā
GE07bhg4c14u:603_1: 2.55] ity ādinā dattottaram api punaḥ prakārāntareṇa bubhūtsamānaḥ pṛcchatīty avadhāya
GE07bhg4c14u:603_2: prakārāntareṇa tasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ ślokaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:604: yas tāvat kair liṅgair yukto guṇātīto bhavatīti praśnas tasyottaraṃ śṛṇu |
GE07bhg4c14u:609: sarvāṇy api guṇa-kāryāṇi yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni sva-sāmagrī-vaśād udbhūtāni santi duḥkha-rūpāṇy api duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c14u:610: tathā vināśa-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni tāni sukha-rūpāṇy api santi sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati na kāmayate svapnavan mithyātva-niścayāt
GE07bhg4c14u:611: | etādṛśa-dveṣa-rāga-śūnyo yaḥ sa guṇātīta ucyata iti caturtha-śloka-gatenānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:612: idaṃ ca svātma-pratyakṣaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ svārtham eva na parārtham |
GE07bhg4c14u:613: na hi svāśritau dveṣa-tad-abhāvau rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paraḥ pratyetum arhati ||22||
GE07bhg4c14u:615: tatra kair liṅgair guṇātīto bhavatīti prathama-praśnasyottaram āha prakāśaṃ ca sarva-dvāreṣu dehe 'smin prakāśa upajāyate iti sattva-kāryam |
GE07bhg4c14u:619: sarvāṇy api yathāyathaṃ sampravṛttāni svataḥ-prāptāni duḥkha-buddhyā yo na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c14u:620: guṇa-kāryāṇy etāni nivṛttāni ca sukha-buddhyā yo na kāṅkṣati,
GE07bhg4c14u:624: yadyapi sthita-prajñasya kā bhāṣā ity ādinā pṛṣṭam idaṃ prajahāti yadā kāmān ity ādinottaritaṃ ca,
GE07bhg4c14u:625: tathāpi viśeṣa-jijñāsayā pṛcchatīti vidhāntareṇa tasya lakṣāṇādīny āha bhagavān prakāśaṃ cety ādi pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:626_0: tatraikena lakṣaṇaṃ sva-saṃvedyam āha prakāśaṃ sattva-kāryaṃ pravṛttiṃ rajaḥ-kāryaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:626_1: mohaṃ tamaḥ-kāryaṃ etāni trīṇi sampravṛttāny utpādaka-sāmagrī-vaśāt prāptāni duḥkha-rūpāṇy
GE07bhg4c14u:627: vināśaka-sāmagrī-vaśān nivṛttāni vinaṣṭāni tāni sukha-rūpāny api sukha-buddhyā yo nākāṅkṣati,
GE07bhg4c14u:628: etādṛśa-dveṣa-rāga-śūnyo guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti caturthenānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:629: svagatau dveṣa-tad-abhāvau rāga-tad-abhāvau ca paro na veditum arhatīti sva-saṃvedyam idaṃ lakṣaṇam ||22||
GE07bhg4c14u:632: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:633: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate ||23||
GE07bhg4c14u:635: tad evaṃ sva-saṃvedyaṃ guṇātītasya lakṣaṇam uktvā para-saṃvedyaṃ tasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ dvitīya-praśnasya kim ācāra ity asyottaram āha udāsīnavad iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:636: udāsīnavat sākṣitayāsīnaḥ sthitaḥ san guṇair guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir na yo vicālyate svarūpān na pracyavate api tu guṇā eva svakāryeṣu vartante |
GE07bhg4c14u:637: etair mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tuṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati |
GE07bhg4c14u:641: viśvanāthaḥ : kim ācāraḥ iti dvitīya-praśnasyottaram āha udāsīnavad iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:642: guṇa-kāryaiḥ sukha-duḥkhādibhir yo na vicālyate svarūpāvasthān na cyavate,
GE07bhg4c14u:643: api tu guṇa eva sva-sva-kāryeṣu vartanta ity eveti ebhir mama sambandha eva nāstīti viveka-jñānena yas tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhati parasmaipadam ārṣam |
GE07bhg4c14u:645: guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate iti guṇātītasya etāni cihnāni etān ācārāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaiva guṇātīto vaktavyo na tu guṇātītatvopapatti-vāvadūko guṇātīto vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ ||23-25||
GE07bhg4c14u:647: atha para-saṃvedya-lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ kim ācāraḥ iti dvitīya-praśnasyottaram āha udāsīneti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:648: udāsīno madhyastho yathā vivādinoḥ pakṣagrahaiḥ sva-mādhyasthyān na vicālyate,
GE07bhg4c14u:649: tayā sukha-duḥkhādi-bhāvena parṇatair guṇair yo nātmāvasthitair vicālyate,
GE07bhg4c14u:651: mama tair na sambandha iti niścitya tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhate |
GE07bhg4c14u:664: tulyo nindā cātmanaḥ saṃstutiś ca yasya ||24||
GE07bhg4c14u:666: same duḥkha-sukhe dveṣa-rāga-śūnyatayānātma-dharmatayānṛtatayā ca yasya sa sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:667: kasmād evaṃ yasmāt svasthaḥ svasminn ātmany eva sthito dvaita-darśana-śūnyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:668: ata eva samāni heyopādeya-bhāva-rahitāni loṣṭāśma-kāñcanāni yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c14u:670: ata eva tulye priyāpriye sukha-duḥkha-sādhane yasya hita-sādhanatva-buddhi-viṣayatvābhāvenopekṣaṇīyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:673: nindātma-saṃstutī doṣa-kīrtana-guṇa-kīrtane yasya sa guṇātīta ucyata iti dvitīya-gatenānvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c14u:676: yato 'yaṃ svasthaḥ svarūpa-niṣṭho 'taeva sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥṅ same anātma-dharmatvāt tulye sukha-duḥkhe yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:677: samāny anupādeyatayā tulyāni losṭrādīni yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:678: loṣṭra-mṛt-piṇḍa-tulye priyāpriye sukha-duḥkha-sādhane vastunī yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:682: ya īdṛśo guṇatītaḥ sa ucyata iti dvitīyenānvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c14u:690: sarvān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthān ārambhān udyamān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:695: nindā-stutī śabda-rūpe mānāpamānau tu śabdam antareṇāpi kāya-mano-vyāpāra-viśeṣāv iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:696: atra pa-kāra-va-kārayoḥ pāṭha-vikalpe 'py arthaḥ sa eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:698: mitra-pakṣasyevāri-pakṣasyāpi dveṣāviṣayaḥ svayaṃ tayor anugraha-nigraha-śūnya iti vā |
GE07bhg4c14u:700: ārabhyanta ity ārambhāḥ karmāṇi tān sarvān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c14u:702: udāsīnavad āsīna ity ādy-ukta-prakārācāro guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:703: yad uktam upekṣakatvādi tad-vidyodayāt pūrvaṃ yatna-sādhyaṃ vidyādhikāriṇā sādhanatvenānuṣṭheyam utpannāyāṃ tu
GE07bhg4c14u:704: vidyāyāṃ jīvan-muktasya guṇātītasyoktaṃ dharma-jātam ayatna-siddhaṃ lakṣaṇatvena tiṣṭhaty arthaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c14u:708: mānāpamānau tu kāyamanovyāpāreṇāpi syātām iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:710: ya īdṛśo guṇātītaḥ undāsīnavat ity ādy uktā yasyācārḥ parair api saṃvedyāḥ sa guṇātīto bodhyo na tu tad-upapatti-vāvadūka iti bhāvaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c14u:715: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:718: mām eva parameśvaram avyabhicāreṇa ekāntena bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa etān guṇān samatītya samyag atikramya brahma-bhūyāya brahma-bhāvāya mokṣāya kalpate samartho bhavati ||26||
GE07bhg4c14u:719: madhusūdanaḥ : adhunā katham etān guṇān ativartata iti tṛtīya-praśnasya prativacanam āha māṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c14u:721_0: mām eveśvaraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ sarva-bhūtāntaryāmiṇaṃ māyayā kṣetrajñatām āgataṃ paramānanda-ghanaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:721_1: bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam avyabhicāreṇa parama-prema-lakṣaṇena bhakti-yogena dvādaśādhyāyoktena
GE07bhg4c14u:721_2: yaḥ sevate sadā cintayati sa mad-bhakta etān prāg-uktān guṇān samatītya samyag-atikramyādvaita-darśanena
GE07bhg4c14u:721_3: bādhitvā brahma-bhūyāya brahma-bhavanāya mokṣāya kalpate samartho bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:722: sarvadā bhagavac-cintanam eva guṇātītatvopāya ity arthaḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c14u:723: viśvanāthaḥ : kathaṃ caitān trīn guṇān ativartate iti tṛtīyapraśnasyottaram āha māṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c14u:725_0: mām eva śyāmasundarākāraṃ parameśvaraṃ bhakti-yogena yaḥ sevate sa eva brahma-bhūyāya
GE07bhg4c14u:725_1: brahmatvāya brahmānubhavāya yāvat bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ iti mad-vākye ekayeti
GE07bhg4c14u:725_2: viśeṣaṇopanyāsāt mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te ity atrāpi eva-kāra-prayogāt
GE07bhg4c14u:725_3: bhaktyā vinā prakārāntareṇa brahmānubhavo na bhavatīti niścayāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:728: jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset iti jñānināṃ carama-daśāyāṃ jñānasyāpi nyāsa-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:729: bhakti-yogasya tu kvāpi nyāsāśravaṇāt bhakti-yoga eva so 'vyabhicāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:730: tena karma-yogam iva jñāna-yogam api parityājya yady avyabhicāreṇa kevalenaiva
GE07bhg4c14u:731: bhaktiyogena sevate, tarhi jñānī api guṇātīto bhavati, nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c14u:732: ananya-bhaktas tu nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ ity ekādaśokter guṇātīto bhavaty eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:733: atra idaṃ tattvaṃ VEṛṣE ity atrāsaṅginaḥ karmiṇo jñānino vā sāttvikatvenaiva sādhakatvāvagates tat-sāhacaryāt nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ iti bhaktaḥ sādhaka evāvagamyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:734: tataś ca jñānī jñāna-siddhaḥ sann eva sāttvikatvaṃ parityajya guṇātīto bhavati |
GE07bhg4c14u:735: bhaktas tu sādhaka-daśām ārabhyaiva guṇātīto bhavatīty artho labhyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:737: mām eveśvaraṃ nārāyaṇam avyabhicāreṇa bhakti-yogena dvādaśādyāyoktena yaḥ sevata iti madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāś ca vyācakṣate ||26||
GE07bhg4c14u:738: baladevaḥ : kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartata iti tṛtīya-praśnasyottaram āha māṃ ceti |
GE07bhg4c14u:740: nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ karāram ity ādy-uktyā yo guṇa-puruṣa-viveka-khyātim avāpa tayaiva tasyā guṇātyayo na saṃsidhyati,
GE07bhg4c14u:741_0: kintu tadvān api yo māṃ kṛṣṇam eva māyā-guṇāspṛṣṭaṃ māyā-niyantāraṃ nāyāyaṇādi-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c14u:741_2: bhakti-yogena sevate śrayati sa etān duratyayān api guṇān atītyākramya brahma-bhūyāya
GE07bhg4c14u:744: tathā ca bhakti-śiraskayaiva tad-viveka-khyātyā jīvasya svarūpa-lābho,
GE07bhg4c14u:746: yat tu brahma-bhūyāya ity anena mad-rūpatāṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:748: tan-niravadhānam eva tenaivedaṃ jñānam ity ādinā mokṣe 'pi |
GE07bhg4c14u:749_0: svarūpa-bhedasyābhihitatvāt nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti ity ādi śrutiṣv api
GE07bhg4c14u:749_1: tatra tasya dṛṣṭatvād aṇutva-vibhutvādi-nitya-dharma-kṛtatvena nityatvāc ca tad-bhedasya
GE07bhg4c14u:749_2: tasmād guṇāṣṭaka-viśiṣṭatvam eva brahaiva san brahmāpy eti iti śrutyau tu brahma-sadṛśaḥ
GE07bhg4c14u:751: vavā yathā tathaivevaṃ sāmye ity amara-koṣāc ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:757: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha brahmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:760: yathā ghanībhūtaḥ prakāśa eva sūrya-maṇḍalaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:763: tathā tat-sādhanasya śāśvatasya dharmasya ca śiddja-sattvātmakatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:766: ato mat-sevino mad-bhāvasyāvaśyambhāvitvād yuktam evoktaṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti ||
GE07bhg4c14u:768: sukhaṃ tarati mad-bhakta ity abhāṣi caturdaśe ||
GE07bhg4c14u:773: madhusūdanaḥ : atra hetum āha brahmaṇa iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:774_2: ahaṃ nivikalpako vāsudevaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty atreti pratiṣṭhā kalpita-rūpa-rahitam akalpitaṃ rūpam |
GE07bhg4c14u:775: ato yo mām upādhikaṃ brahma sevate sa brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti yuktam eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:776: kīdṛśasya brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāham ity ākāṅkṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇāni amṛtasya vināśa-rahitasya,
GE07bhg4c14u:781: sukhasya viṣayendriya-saṃyogajatvaṃ vārayati aikāntikasyāvyabhicāriṇaḥ sarvasmin deśe kāle ca vidyamānasyaikāntika-sukha-rūpasyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:782: etādṛśasya brahmaṇo yasmād ahaṃ vāstavaṃ svarūpaṃ tasmān mad-bhaktaḥ saṃsārān mucyata iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:783: tathā coktaṃ brahmaṇā bhagavantaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ prati -
GE07bhg4c14u:788: atra sarvopādhi-śūnya ātmā brahma tvam ity arthaḥ | śukenāpi stutim antareṇaivoktam -
GE07bhg4c14u:789: sarveṣām api vastūnāṃ bhāvārtho bhavati sthitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:790: tasyāpi bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ kim atad vastu rūpyatām || [BhP 10.14.57] iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:791: sarveṣām eva kārya-vastūnāṃ bhāvārthaḥ sattā-rūpaḥ paramārtho bhavati kāryākāreṇa jāyamāne sopādhike brahmaṇi sthitaḥ kāraṇa-sattātiriktāyāḥ kārya-sattāyā anabhyupagamāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:792: tasyāpi bhavataḥ kāraṇasya sopādhikasya brahmaṇo bhāvārthaḥ sattā-rūpo 'rtho bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ sopādhikasya nirupādhike kalpitatvāt kalpitasya cādhiṣṭhānān atirekāt,
GE07bhg4c14u:794: ataḥ kim atad-vastu tasmāc chrī-kṛṣṇād anyad vastu paramārthikaṃ kiṃ nirūpyatāṃ tad evaikaṃ paramārthikaṃ nānyat kim apīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:795: tad etad ihāpy uktaṃ brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:796: athavā tvad-bhaktas tvad-bhāvam āpnotu nāma kathaṃ nu brahma-bhāvāya kalpyate brahmaṇaḥ sakāśāt tavānyatvād ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:797: brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ pratiṣṭhā paryāptir aham eva na tu mad-bhinnaṃ brahmety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:798: tathāmṛtasya amṛtatvasya mokṣasya cāvyayasya sarvathānucchedyasya ca ca pratiṣṭhāham eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:799: mayy eva mokṣaḥ paryavastio mat-prāptir eva mokṣa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:800: tathā śāśvatasya nitya-mokṣa-phalasya dharmasya jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇasya ca paryāptir aham eva |
GE07bhg4c14u:801: jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇo dharmo mayy eva paryavasito na tena mad-bhinnaṃ kiṃcit prāpyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:802: tathaikāntikasya sukhasya ca paryāptir aham eva parmānanda-rūpatvān na mad-bhinnaṃ kiṃcit sukhaṃ prāpyam astīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:803: tasmād yuktam evoktaṃ mad-bhakto brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti ||27||
GE07bhg4c14u:811_0: hi yasmāt parama-pratiṣṭhātvena prasiddhaṃ yad brahma tasyāpy ahaṃ pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhīyate
GE07bhg4c14u:811_1: 'sminn iti pratiṣṭhā āśrayo 'nna-mayādiṣu śrutiṣu sarvatraiva pratiṣṭhā-padasya tathārthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c14u:814: tathā śāśvatasya dharmasya sādhana-phala-daśayor api nitya-sthitasya bhakty-ākhyasya parama-dharmasyāhaṃ pratiṣṭhā,
GE07bhg4c14u:815: tathā tat-prāpyasyaikāntika-bhakta-sambandhinaḥ sukhasya premṇaś cāhaṃ pratiṣṭhā |
GE07bhg4c14u:816: ataḥ sarvasyāpi mad-adhīnatvāt kaivalya-kāmanayā kṛtena mad-bhajanena brahmaṇi līyamāno brahmatvam api prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c14u:817: atra brahmaṇo 'haṃ pratiṣṭhā ghanībhūtaṃ brahmaivāhaṃ yathā ghanībhūta-prakāśa eva sūrya-maṇḍalaṃ tadvad ity arthaḥ iti svāmi-caraṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:818: sūryasya tejo-rūpatve 'pi yathā tejasa āśrayatvam apy ucyate |
GE07bhg4c14u:819: evaṃ me kṛṣṇasya brahma-rūpatve 'pi brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhātvam api |
GE07bhg4c14u:820: atra śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇam api pramāṇam -- śubhāśrayaḥ sa cittasya sarvagasya tathātmanaḥ [ViP 6.7.76] iti vyākhyātaṃ ca tatrāpi svāmi-caraṇaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:822: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:824: prakṛtau puruṣe caiva brahmaṇy api sa prabhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:825: yathaika eva puruṣo vāsudevo vyavasthitaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:829: tathā hari-vaṃśe 'pi vipra-kumārānayana-prasaṅge arjunaṃ prati śrī-bhagavad-vākyaṃ --
GE07bhg4c14u:830: tat-paraṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaṃ vibhajate jagat |
GE07bhg4c14u:831: mamaiva tad ghanaṃ tejo jñātum arhasi bhārata || (HV 2.114.11-12)
GE07bhg4c14u:836: govindam ādi-puruṣaṃ tam ahaṃ bhajāmi || iti |
GE07bhg4c14u:839: vetsyasy anugṛhītaṃ me sampraśnair vivṛtaṃ hṛdi || iti bhagavad-uktiś ca |
GE07bhg4c14u:840_0: madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāś ca vyācakṣate sma yathā -- nanu tvad-bhaktas tvad-bhāvam
GE07bhg4c14u:840_1: āpnotu nāma kathaṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpate brahmaṇaḥ sakāśāt tavānyatvād ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:846: vande nandātmajaṃ mahaḥ || ity upaślokayāmāsuś ca ||27||
GE07bhg4c14u:848: tac ca bhaktyaiva bhavatīty adhyāyārtho nirūpitaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c14u:852: nanu tad-viveka-khyātyā tvad-eka-bhaktyā ca guṇātīto labdha-svarūpo brahma-śabdito muktaḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhed iti cet tatrāha brahmaṇo hīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:854_1: mṛitir nirgatasyāvyayasya tādrūpyaṇaikarasasya muktasya mad-atipriyasyāham eva vijñānānanda-mūrtir
GE07bhg4c14u:855: pratiṣṭhā pratiṣṭhīyate 'tra iti nirukteḥ paramāśrayo 'tipriyo bhavāmīti tādṛśaṃ māṃ parayā bhaktyānubhavaṃs tiṣṭhatīti |
GE07bhg4c14u:856: na matto viśleṣa-leśo na ca punar āvartate,
GE07bhg4c14u:857: yad gatvā na nivartante muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥ iti smṛtibhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c14u:858_0: nanu muktas tvāṃ kathaṃ śrayeta śravaṇa-phalasya mukter lābhād iti ced asty atiśayitaṃ
GE07bhg4c14u:858_1: phalam iti bhāvenāha śāśvatasya sādhāraṇasya sukhasya ca vicitra-līlā-rasasyāham eva pratiṣṭheti |
